title: My Club
body:
It's been months and clubs still haven't been fixed.
When will the clubs get fixed? My account got kicked out of its own club.

replies.body:
Im still having this issue with my own club... my club name is Plebalicious...
@Riot Gehirn could you help me too pls?? <3

Hi Pured, when I last spoke with the clubs team on this issue they mentioned that the issue should automatically fix now whenever a club member (not leader) logs in and checks the club, essentially requesting the latest info from the server. Has your club currently got active members who have logged in recently?
i have daily active members but i still cant access my own club
Please provide the name of your club and I'll take a look. Although I might not be able to get it resolved until early Jan due to the holiday season.
ign is  Nazzareno club is Tsundere Squad
Thanks, I've located you in the club so this may have refreshed its status for you. Take a look when you next log in and let me know if you're still unable to see your club.
ayyy its all fixed now thanks mate

That doesn't work.
It says I'm the owner of the club, but when I click on "clubs", it says "create a new club" and I don't have the tag.
Could you provide me with the name of your club and one of its members? I'll take a look but probably won't be able to get it resolved until early Jan due to the holiday season.
My name is Pured and the club is Pured.

Ok I was able to find your club, by looking it up I may have refreshed its status. The regular refresh I was talking about before may not have worked for you due to there being too few members in the club. Can you see your club now?
